chapters.title: Chapter 1: Seeds of Shadow
chapters.info: Mistress of Novices, p. 20 (7)—Aes Sedai in charge of novice training in the White Tower. She serves as both a disciplinarian and a shoulder to cry on for girls who need either. The current Mistress of Novices is Sheriam Bayanar of the Blue Ajah. See also Bayanar, Sheriam.
